success.reason: The assistant scheduled a 90-minute virtual panel discussion on 2025-11-12 from 16:00 to 17:30 Europe/Madrid with attendees maria.gonzalez@ucm.es and carlos.mendez@ucm.es (plus the user), matching the target slots, and sent calendar invitations. The incorrect earlier event was also canceled as requested.

role_confusion.reason: The user only requested scheduling actions, provided details, and corrected an error about the date—all normal user behavior. They did not ask questions to help the assistant, offer help to the assistant, confirm details on the assistant’s behalf, or provide recommendations to the assistant.
